name: Learn Japanese 1000 sentences
description: Some features of Learn Japanese app: - About 1000 sentences divided to 18 categories (include sounds) - Bookmark difficult sentence. - Search sentences by Japanese or its mean. - Practice each sentence by voice (by long touch this sentence). - Test sentences which learned by input text or input voice. If you want download other learn japanese app,please visit the fanpage below. https://www.facebook.com/Kanjivn
